# Solicitation Summary
===============

Solicitation Title:
---------------

* **English:** W0133-25PL07 - Accommodation in Comox Valley, BC, Canada
* **French:** W0133-25PL07 - Hébergement dans Comox vallée, CB, Canada

Reference Number:
----------------

* **Reference Number:** WS4704220375-Doc4706304896

Publication and Closing Dates:
-----------------------------

* **Publication Date:** July 26, 2024
* **Closing Date:** August 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

Scope of Work:
--------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide accommodation services in the Comox Valley, BC, Canada. The contractor must provide a hotel or a combination of hotels located within a 20-kilometer driving distance of the 19 Wing Comox, Lazo, BC, V0R 2K0.

Services Required:
-----------------

* The contractor must provide accommodation services for the period of September 8, 2024, to September 14, 2024, inclusively.
* The contractor must ensure that the accommodations meet the requirements of DND.

Evaluation Criteria:
-------------------

* The contractor's bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

Trade Agreements:
----------------

This solicitation is open to contractors who are eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Contact Information:
-------------------

Contractor: SPAC/PSPC
Alexandre Ruaud
alexandre.ruaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Procurement Language:
-------------------

English and French

Note: The solicitation description is a single document containing both the English and French versions of the solicitation. Please refer to the attached files for more information.
